attributes.action: give the people a say on any further integration into europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To the british Government . The last time the people of the UK had a say on Europe was if we wanted to join a COMMON MARKET. This did not entail becoming part of a european state or being governed by people from outside of the UK especially unelected  non Uk residents. we did not agree then to adopt their laws their currencies or agree to Europe setting our taxation or having control over our armed forces. It is time the citizens of the Uk were allowed to say how far we want this inergration to go before the government signs us up to any more unwanted commitments
